AM.T: For His anger is fleeting, but His favor lasts a lifetime. Weeping may stay the night, but joy comes in the morning.

PM.T: Then Jesus said, “Father, forgive them, for they do not know what they are doing.”

AM.T: The LORD is the strength of His people, a stronghold of salvation for His anointed.

PM.T: And He took the bread, gave thanks and broke it, and gave it to them, saying, “This is My body, given for you; do this in remembrance of Me.”

AM.T: You have given me Your shield of salvation, and Your gentleness exalts me.

PM.T: He must turn from evil and do good; he must seek peace and pursue it.

AM.T: The precepts of the LORD are right, bringing joy to the heart;

PM.T: And He will send out His angels with a loud trumpet call, and they will gather His elect from the four winds, from one end of the heavens to the other.

AM.T: As iron sharpens iron, so one man sharpens another.

PM.T: Who of you by worrying can add a single hour to his life?

AM.T: How can a young man keep his way pure? By guarding it according to Your word.

PM.T: And God put everything under His feet and made Him head over everything for the church,

AM.T: A man of many companions may come to ruin, but there is a friend who stays closer than a brother.

PM.T: Therefore I urge you, brothers, on account of God’s mercy, to offer your bodies as living sacrifices, holy and pleasing to God, which is your spiritual service of worship.

AM.T: So let your heart be fully devoted to the LORD our God, as it is this day, to walk in His statutes and to keep His commandments.”

PM.T: For you, brothers, were called to freedom; but do not use your freedom as an opportunity for the flesh. Rather, serve one another in love.

AM.T: A good name is more desirable than great riches; favor is better than silver and gold.

PM.T: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit,

AM.T: In your splendor ride forth in victory on behalf of truth and humility and justice; may your right hand show your awesome deeds.

PM.T: But as for me, may I never boast, except in the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ, through which the world has been crucified to me, and I to the world.

AM.T: As for God, His way is perfect; the word of the LORD is flawless. He is a shield to all who take refuge in Him.

PM.T: Jesus said to her, “I am the resurrection and the life. Whoever believes in Me will live, even though he dies.

AM.T: Blessed are those whose way is blameless, who walk in the Law of the LORD.

PM.T: But many who are first will be last, and the last will be first.

AM.T: Better one handful with tranquility than two handfuls with toil and pursuit of the wind.

PM.T: Then the seventh angel sounded his trumpet, and loud voices called out in heaven: “The kingdom of the world has become the kingdom of our Lord and of His Christ, and He will reign forever and ever.”

AM.T: Taste and see that the LORD is good; blessed is the man who takes refuge in Him!

PM.T: Humble yourselves before the Lord, and He will exalt you.

AM.T: My flesh and my heart may fail, but God is the strength of my heart and my portion forever.

PM.T: For from Him and through Him and to Him are all things. To Him be the glory forever! Amen.

AM.T: Whoever heeds instruction is on the path to life, but he who ignores reproof goes astray.

PM.T: Mercy, peace, and love be multiplied to you.

AM.T: My God is my rock, in whom I take refuge, my shield, and the horn of my salvation. My stronghold, my refuge, and my Savior, You save me from violence.

PM.T: By this we can be sure that we have come to know Him: if we keep His commandments.

AM.T: O LORD, be gracious to us! We wait for You. Be our strength every morning and our salvation in time of trouble.

PM.T: I ask that out of the riches of His glory He may strengthen you with power through His Spirit in your inner being,

AM.T: Make a joyful noise to the LORD, all the earth; break forth — let your cry ring out, and sing praises!

PM.T: Do not work for food that perishes, but for food that endures to eternal life, which the Son of Man will give you. For on Him God the Father has placed His seal of approval.”

AM.T: He has shown you, O man, what is good. And what does the LORD require of you but to act justly, to love mercy, and to walk humbly with your God?

PM.T: This promise belongs to you and your children and to all who are far off — to all whom the Lord our God will call to Himself.”

AM.T: May God be gracious to us and bless us, and cause His face to shine upon us, Selah

PM.T: Therefore He is able to save completely those who draw near to God through Him, since He always lives to intercede for them.

AM.T: Send out Your light and Your truth; let them lead me. Let them bring me to Your holy mountain and to the place where You dwell.

PM.T: If you really fulfill the royal law stated in Scripture, “Love your neighbor as yourself,” you are doing well.

AM.T: For this reason a man will leave his father and mother and be united to his wife, and they will become one flesh.

PM.T: And He has qualified us as ministers of a new covenant, not of the letter but of the Spirit; for the letter kills, but the Spirit gives life.

AM.T: I waited patiently for the LORD; He inclined to me and heard my cry.

PM.T: He who is not with Me is against Me, and he who does not gather with Me scatters.

AM.T: As far as the east is from the west, so far has He removed our transgressions from us.

PM.T: But you know that Christ appeared to take away sins, and in Him there is no sin.

AM.T: GOD the Lord is my strength; He makes my feet like those of a deer; He makes me walk upon the heights!

PM.T: Let no unwholesome talk come out of your mouths, but only what is helpful for building up the one in need and bringing grace to those who listen.

AM.T: Honor your father and mother, so that your days may be long in the land that the LORD your God is giving you.

PM.T: Therefore, since we have been justified through faith, we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ,

AM.T: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in times of trouble.

PM.T: For in Christ all the fullness of the Deity dwells in bodily form.
